channel.title: Spawn-Pk | INSTANT PKING | PLAY NOW
channel.description:
[center][img]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/spawnpk.gif[/img] One of the best Pk'ing servers out!
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/Spawn-Pk.jar]Click Here to Download Client[/url] - [url=http://www.spawnpk.com/play/][img]http://vyre-scape.com/images/PlayNow.png[/img]Click here to Play the Webclient[/url] - [url=http://www.spawnpk.com/][img]http://vyre-scape.com/images/Website.png[/img]Website[/url]
[B][SIZE=4]Features[/SIZE]
No Lag! VPS with 100% uptime! - Instantly Pk with Free items! - Bank setup for pk'ing as soon as you log in! Ability to set your combat stats! - EP with rewards system! - Wilderness targeting system! Curses/Lunars! - Small cache! - Perfect switches for hybrids! - All PvP Amours/Weapons! Chaotic Weapons! - Ability to change Game frame from 317 to 602! - Vote4Rewards Bank Pins! - Auto Donation System - Shops with free items for Pking
[SIZE=5]And much much more!![/SIZE]
[/center]
Media [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/Media.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/pkpshopmedia.png[/img][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/getidcommand.png[/img] [IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/medialyaltytitles.png[/img][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/tzharr.png[/img][IMG]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/32823198/mediabankpins.png[/img]
